ticket.title: Ruby 1.9.2 and Rails 3.0.pre Aborts on script/generate
ticket.original-body:
This appears to be an issue with the Ruby 1.9.2 interpreter and I installed via RVM. Thus, I'm wondering, if there's an additional step to prevent the following issue:
@@@

ticket.original-body-html:
This appears to be an issue with the Ruby 1.9.2 interpreter and I installed via RVM. Thus, I'm wondering, if there's an additional step to prevent the following issue:
